nodes.text: Fomalhaut was the primary star of the Fomalhaut system. It was orbited by at least one small planet. Fomalhaut was prone to seasonal solar eruptions, which forced spacers and pilots to perform many arduous maneuvers before jumping in hyperspace.

The star Fomalhaut has only been mentioned in L'Arche d'Alliance ("The Ark of Covenant"), a scenario published in the French RPG magazine Graal 17. In real life, the Fomalhaut is a star in the Piscis Austrinus constellation.
